map-maker.polygon-description: Include locations by drawing one or more polygons on the map. Recommended when you want to cover larger areas such as a city or country and provide better variation and replayability in your map.
map-maker.streetview-no-results-error: This location is no longer available in Google Streetview.
map-maker.import-instruction: In case you have many locations you can choose to import a CSV file, or export the current locations for post-processing. The format of the CSV file is: {0}
map-maker.unique-locations-description: Hand-craft every single location. Gives you full control over the locations included in your map, but also means that you have to put a lot of locations in to keep your map fun over several games.
map-maker.invalid-total-location-count-w: Too few locations. A minimum of {0} locations are required for the map to be published.
map-maker.delete-map-body: Are you sure you want to delete this map?
map-maker.switch-type-to-coordinates: If you switch from regions to locations you will loose all your current regions.
map-maker.switch-type-to-regions: If you switch from locations to regions you will loose all your current locations.
map-maker.validation-error: You must give the map a name and have at least {0} locations.
map-maker.pro-account-required-body: Creating maps is only available for GeoGuessr Pro members.
map-maker.required-locations-message: You need to pick at least {0}.
map-maker.streetview-failed-to-load-erro: Failed to load this location. Please select a new one!
map-maker.not-found: This map doesn't seem to exist
map-maker.migrate-to-new-map-maker: We aim to close down the old map maker and replace it with the new one very soon
map-maker.delete-draft-dialog-title: Are you sure that you want to delete this draft?
map-maker.delete-draft-dialog-content: This action is irreversible! your draft won't be able to be recovered.
map-maker.you-have-changes: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure that you want to leave?
map-maker.invalid-name: Failed to publish map because it has an invalid name
map-maker.invalid-region: Failed to publish map, because it contains an invalid region
map-maker.180th-meridian-error: Failed to publish map, because it contains a polygon crossing the 180th meridian
map-maker.too-few-coordinates: Map has too few coordinates to be published
